Class Herbalist

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.Character
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.Herbalist
All Implemented Interfaces:
Jsonable
public class Herbalist extends Character
Represents a Herbalist card.

    • doEffect

      Tuple<ActionPhase,Character> doEffect(ActionPhase phase, CharacterStep... steps) throws InvalidCharacterParameterException, InvalidPhaseUpdateException
      Place a block card on the specified island. This card uses 1 step, any more will be ignored. The parameters used in the step are the following:
      • island: island index to block
      Overrides:
      doEffect in class Character
      Parameters:
      phase - the ActionPhase the card's effect has been called from
      steps - an array of CharacterStep configuring the effect
      Returns:
      a Tuple containing the updated ActionPhase and the updated Character
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if phase or steps or are null
      InvalidCharacterParameterException - if any of the parameters in steps is formatted incorrectly
      InvalidPhaseUpdateException - if the effect of the card would modify the state in an illegal way

    • pushBlock

      Overrides:

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      the updated Herbalist
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if block is null or this card is not the owner of the block
